snippet: Federal safety inspectors have ordered one of the nation’s deepest underground mines closed in northern Idaho after an inquiry prompted by a series of accidents that killed two miners.
abstract: Federal safety inspectors order Lucky Friday Mine in northern Idaho closed after an inquiry prompted by a series of accidents that killed two miners; silver mine is one of the deepest in the nation.
lead_paragraph: Federal safety inspectors have ordered one of the nation’s deepest underground mines closed in northern Idaho after an inquiry prompted by a series of accidents that killed two miners.

headline.main: Idaho: Silver Mine Ordered Closed After Safety Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Idaho: Silver Mine Ordered Closed After Safety Inquiry
